content: Act as a helpful AI assistant
In Julia, Write a function `find`. It computes median over arbitrary array. Provide an example

Sure, here's the function to find the median in Julia:

```julia
function find_median(arr::Array)
    sort!(arr)
    n = length(arr)
    if n%2 == 0 # If array size is even
        return (arr[nรท2] + arr[(n+1)รท2])/2
    else # If array size is odd
        return arr[div(n+1,2)]
    end
end
```

You can test this function with an example:

```julia
arr = [45, 32, 67, 89, 55]
println("Median is $(find_median(arr))")
```

This will print "Median is 55" because 55 is the median value in this array.
